rows.label: qst201318_msg0001
rows.name: Mouftar! Thank goodness, you're safe!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0002
rows.name: Mommy!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0003
rows.name: I'm glad they could be reunited safely.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0004
rows.name: Yes... A smile suits a child best.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0005
rows.name: Thank you for bringing my son back!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0006
rows.name: Not at all. We only did what was right.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd like to ask one thing...
Do you remember what happened
when your son went missing?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0008
rows.name: Yes... It was early in the morning.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0009
rows.name:
I had an errand at a shop in Elmos
Square, and I took him with me.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0010
rows.name:
Then, I looked away for just
a moment, and he was gone...

rows.label: qst201318_msg0011
rows.name: I'm so glad he was found...

rows.label: qst201318_msg0012
rows.name: Hey, miss.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0013
rows.name: Yes? What is it?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0014
rows.name: Um, I think I remembered something...

rows.label: qst201318_msg0020
rows.name:
I was taken to Genbu
Port and put on a ship.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0015
rows.name: Is that true?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0016
rows.name:
But right after that, they made me
drink something and I fell asleep,
so I don't remember anything else...

rows.label: qst201318_msg0017
rows.name: No, that's more than enough. Thank you.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0018
rows.name: Okay!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0019
rows.name:
Genbu Port in the early morning...
We should go take a look.
